name: Triangulum
description:
Triangulum is a minimalist puzzle game with calm, ambient music. Disperse points among triangles to increase your score. Learn common strategies that maximize points, experience satisfying chaining effects between triangles, and discover solutions with insanely high scores.

Key Features


  • 5 types of triangles, each with a different mechanic
  • 52 challenging and satisfying levels
  • Relaxing ambient soundtrack
  • Dark mode
  • Colorblind mode
